flavorText: The elves gathered huge piles of rot to grow fungus. Out of imitation or forethought, the thallids did the same.
name: Night Soil
originalText: {1}, Remove two creature cards in a single graveyard from the game: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play.

rulings.text: The two creature cards are exiled as a cost. No one can respond to this. If no graveyard has two creature cards in it, the cost can’t be paid.

text: {1}, Exile two creature cards from a single graveyard: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
